channel.title: Fillinstream error

item.title: Fillinstream error
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

I’m returning to coding my 317 server, and when I tried to login I got the message “ERROR FILLINSTREAM” in my server.bat. I traced the error message to this void.

private void fillInStream(int forceRead) throws Exception{ try { inStream.currentOffset = 0; in.read(inStream.buffer, 0, forceRead); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); System.out.println("ERROR FILLINSTREAM"); disconnected = true; } }

The error:

Read full topic
